position.marginalia_text: Nihil tam aduersum Entelechia[e], quàm Venus, et Carcer.

marginalia.translation: Nothing is more adverse to Actualization than Venus and Jail.

position.marginalia_text: Coelebs, quasi coelitum vnus. a[e]thereus vir.
Nihil corum durum coelibi, qua[e] uxorio cuiq[ue] durissima.
Vnum est maximi viri proprium, posse viuere minimo: et Sibi ipsi sufficientem, quàm minimè alijs egere.
De venere prudentissimè Guicciardinus, i[nfr]a, 163. Hippocratis aphorismus.
Miser homo, cui adhuc discenda è Libris virtus, aut Industria.

marginalia.translation: Miserable is the man for whom virtue and industrious must be learned from books.

position.marginalia_text: Venus est maxima inimia solidi corporis, firmi animi, industrij status: abstinentia[e] studij, meditationis, vigilantia[e], Laboris: assuetudinis, patientia[e], Constantia[e]:
omnium deniq[ue] arduorum, ingentiumq[ue] operum. Facit semihomines, qui alioqui possent osse solidi viri.
